name: Oven-roasted Chickpeas
description: Nix the popcorn and chips at happy hour or your next movie night and crunch on protein-rich, high-fibre roasted seasoned chickpeas (aka garbanzo beans). Add to mezze platters, cheese and charcuterie boards or use as a topper for salads. The usually creamy & soft beans are transformed into crispy, crunchy bites.

ingredients.name: Donair Seasoning or Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 400° F (205° C).
  2. Blot chickpeas dry with a paper towel. In a bowl, mix chickpeas with oil, seasoning and salt. Spread in a single layer on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
  3. Bake for 30–35 min, or until chickpeas are browned and crunchy. Serve immediately.
